it.unibz.inf.qtl1.output
Class OutputDocument

java.lang.Object
  it.unibz.inf.qtl1.output.OutputDocument
Direct Known Subclasses:
LatexDocument, NuSMVOutput
public abstract class OutputDocument
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a template for outputting a formula. Derived classes like LatexDocumentCNF an NuSMVOutput show an example of usage.

Author:
Marco Gario
